Name: Rifle Storm
About the game: Turn-based strategy + roguelike Build a powerful squad, explore randomly generated worlds, acquire almighty gadgets, fight challenging insurgents and capture the bunker! Features: Build a strategic squad: Make best use of your weapons and gadgets to create powerful combos. Choose regions to explore: More stores and helpful events or risky high threat battles for better rewards? Nonlinear progression: Unlock new squads and other secrets with each play through. Randomly generated worlds: Each run contains new random events, rewards and battles. No run is ever the same.
Meta Title: Rifle Storm: Feb 10, 2022, Ben D'Angelo and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Rifle Storm? Check out the release date (Feb 10, 2022), developer insights from Ben D'Angelo, and a complete game summary.
